
```{r}
#| label: tbl-sec9-1
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false
#| tbl-cap: "Secondary objective 9 - Patients taking Ivabradin, loopdiuretics, digoxin or nitrates on top of Beta-blocker, RASi/ARNi, MRA and SGLT2i 2021-2023"
#| tbl-pos: "H"

rsdatatmp <- rsdata %>%
  filter(shf_indexyear_cat == "2021-2023" & sos_lm_sglt2i == "Yes" & sos_lm_bbl == "Yes" & sos_lm_mra == "Yes" & sos_lm_rasiarni == "Yes")

tabn <- rsdatatmp %>%
  count() %>%
  mutate(np = paste0(n)) %>%
  mutate(
    np = case_when(
      n < 10 ~ "<10",
      TRUE ~ np
    ),
    Medication = "N"
  ) %>%
  select(Medication, np)

tab <- rsdatatmp %>%
  count(sos_lm_ivabradin, sos_lm_loopdiuretics, sos_lm_digoxin, sos_lm_nitrate, .drop = F) %>%
  mutate(np = paste0(n, " (", fn(n / sum(n) * 100, 1), ")")) %>%
  mutate(
    np = case_when(
      n < 10 ~ "<10",
      TRUE ~ np
    ),
    sos_lm_ivabradin = if_else(sos_lm_ivabradin == "Yes", "Ivabradin", ""),
    sos_lm_loopdiuretics = if_else(sos_lm_loopdiuretics == "Yes", "Loopdiuretics", ""),
    sos_lm_digoxin = if_else(sos_lm_digoxin == "Yes", "Digoxin", ""),
    sos_lm_nitrate = if_else(sos_lm_nitrate == "Yes", "Nitrate", ""),
    Medication = paste(sos_lm_ivabradin, sos_lm_loopdiuretics, sos_lm_digoxin, sos_lm_nitrate, sep = " "),
    Medication = str_squish(Medication),
    Medication = str_replace_all(Medication, " ", " + "),
    Medication = if_else(Medication == "", "None", Medication)
  ) %>%
  select(Medication, np)

tab <- rbind(tabn, tab)

colnames(tab) <- c("Medication", "Ivabradin, loopdiuretics, digoxin or nitrates on top of all GDMT")

# excel
if (output) {
  make_one_xlsxsheet(tab)
}

colnames(tab) <- sanitize_text(colnames(tab))

default_kable(tab,
  escape = FALSE,
  scale_down = F
) %>%
  footnote(
    footnote_order = c("general", "symbol", "alphabet"),
    general_title = "",
    general = c(
      "Presented with n (%)."
    )
  ) %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "6cm") %>%
  row_spec(1, hline_after = T)
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-sec9-2
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false
#| dependson: tbl-sec9-1
#| tbl-cap: "Secondary objective 9 - Doses by molecule for patients taking Ivabradin, loopdiuretics, digoxin or nitrates on top of Beta-blocker, RASi/ARNi, MRA and SGLT2i 2021-2023"
#| tbl-pos: "H"

sec9func2 <- function(medvar) {
  tab <- rsdatatmp %>%
    filter(!is.na(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)))) %>%
    group_by(!!sym(paste0("ATC_sos_lm_", medvar))) %>%
    reframe(
      med = quantile(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.5)),
      q1 = quantile(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.25)),
      q3 = quantile(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.75)),
      mean = mean(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T),
      sd = sd(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T),
      min = min(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T),
      max = max(!!sym(paste0("dose_sos_lm_", medvar)), na.rm = T),
      n = n()
    ) %>%
    mutate(
      out = paste0(n, ", ", fn(med, 1), " [", fn(min, 1), ", ", fn(q1, 1), ", ", fn(q3, 1), ", ", fn(max, 1), "], ", fn(mean, 1), " (", fn(sd, 1), ")"),
      out = case_when(
        n == 0 ~ "-",
        n < 10 ~ "<10",
        TRUE ~ out
      ),
      var = medvar
    ) %>%
    rename(
      atcvar = !!sym(paste0("ATC_sos_lm_", medvar))
    ) %>%
    select(var, atcvar, out) %>%
    ungroup()
}

medvars <- c("ivabradin", "loopdiuretics", "digoxin", "nitrate")

tab <- lapply(medvars,
  FUN = sec9func2
)
tab <- bind_rows(tab)

tab <- tab %>%
  mutate(
    # if recoding or categorizing will still get org label
    var = factor(case_when(
      var == "ivabradin" ~ 1,
      var == "loopdiuretics" ~ 2,
      var == "digoxin" ~ 3,
      var == "nitrate" ~ 4,
    ), levels = 1:4, labels = c("Ivabradin", "Loopdiuretics", "Digoxin", "Nitrate"))
  )

tab <- left_join(tab, lmvarsub %>% select(-med), by = c("atcvar" = "atc")) %>%
  mutate(atcvar = sub) %>%
  select(-sub)

colnames(tab) <- c("Medication", "Molecule", "Daily dose")

# excel
if (output) {
  make_one_xlsxsheet(tab)
}

colnames(tab) <- sanitize_text(colnames(tab))

default_kable(tab,
  escape = FALSE,
  scale_down = T
) %>%
  footnote(
    footnote_order = c("general", "symbol", "alphabet"),
    general_title = "",
    general = c(
      "Presented with n, median [minimum, q1, q3, maximum], mean (standard deviation)."
    )
  )
```
